meanings.definition: A diagnostic imaging test that uses contrast dye to visualize the spinal cord and surrounding structures.
meanings.sent1: The myelogram helped the doctor see inside my spine.
meanings.sent2: After the myelogram, the doctor could clearly view my spinal cord.
meanings.sent3: During the myelogram, I felt like a human x-ray machine!
meanings.sent4: The myelogram was like a magic window into my body's inner workings.
meanings.sent5: The myelogram made my spine light up like a neon sign.

meanings.definition: The image produced by a myelogram.
meanings.sent1: The myelogram showed a detailed picture of my spinal cord.
meanings.sent2: I was amazed by the clarity of the myelogram image.
meanings.sent3: The myelogram picture looked like a work of art!
meanings.sent4: The myelogram image was as clear as a crystal.
meanings.sent5: The myelogram snapshot captured my spine perfectly.
